President Donald Trump and Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth speak from the Oval Office after teasing a DOD announcement.
by The National News Desk
TOPICS:


Do you support Elon Musk’s DOGE efforts to cut the size of federal government? Vote in the poll above or click here.


President Trump and Defense Secretary Hegseth are scheduled to speak at the White House Friday and it's widely thought they will discuss job cuts at the Pentagon.
Also, likely to address a report about Elon Musk receiving a “top secret” briefing at the Pentagon on China.
